website_summaries.verdict: The turf version of the Diadora Capitano promises an optimal comfort as well as outstanding performance on the pitch. Featuring a natural leather upper which is comparable to the one used on the Adidas Copa Mundial FG, this soccer cleat guarantees excellent ball touch that helps players get ahead in the game. It also integrates the Diadora's shock absorbent system on its midsole.  It is designed to provide protection and heightened comfort. Though a less pricey cleat, this Diadora cleat does not compromise on features.
pros: A good number of commenters praised the Diadora Capitano LT Turf for its high-quality leather upper
Like the classic Adidas Copa Mundial, this cleat is another proof how users love leather materials
Some users who tested the soccer cleat said that it showed excellent grip on the turf
A few purchasers appreciated the beautiful design of the turf cleat
Based on the observation of some players, these turf cleats break in quickly
cons: Most female users found the Capitano LT Turf to run a bit too wide
Some reviewers criticized the thin insole of the cleat, mentioning that it lacked support
A few users reported getting toe blisters after trying out the cleat
According to some observers, these soccer cleats have quite a stiff sole

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable wider shoes
customer_reviews.text: I tried different models from Adidas and Nike and found them too narrow. Diadora seems to make wider shoes. I had the same model for firm ground and liked them so much I bought the turf version as well. They are comfortable, breath well and are still in very good shape after a full year of once a week play.
customer_reviews.author: Jan G

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this shoe. I've played soccer for over 30 years and worn many different shoes over the years. This was easily one of the worst I've ever purchased. The fit was nearly a full size too big, which was annoying enough, but the far bigger problem was that the soles literally came apart and fell off after a single indoor session. I did not have high expectations given the price, but this was unacceptable. I reached out to Diadora to report the problem and got no response whatsoever. I expected more out of Diadora, which has been a solid soccer brand for decades. They certainly failed to deliver with this product. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Nate - Lincoln, Nebraska

customer_reviews.title: Pretty comfy turf shoes
customer_reviews.text: They fit true to size, the leather is nice and soft, and the out-of-the-box comfort this young 50's dude felt running around turf fields in the old boys league with the Diadora's on was quite welcome. Yep, I'd buy 'em again.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie O

customer_reviews.title: fit is not right for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought 0.5 size up. while the pair is bit large overall, surprisingly it rubbed my sole very uncomfortably especially on the side. And I have very narrow feet. I think it has more to do with the material (very stiff as opposed to soft like other brands). Had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: YL

customer_reviews.title: Excellent indoor or turf shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent indoor or turf shoe. They're well-made and feel pretty good. I ordered a 12, which in most shoes fits just a little tight on me but these were a little loose. If I wear a thick pair of socks they're perfect, but if I ordered them again I'd probably order a half-size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: N. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe. Runs a little big.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice shoes, but they seem to run a little big, and I like my soccer shoes to fit snug. I had to return them, and at that time they did not have the next size down available. So I bought some Under Armour turf shoes from the store so I could try them on first.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn L.

customer_reviews.title: If you're a women order 1.5 size down from Men's size
customer_reviews.text: I am a woman ordering these because the women's version are hideous with the garish pink, turquoise and yellow coloring on a white boot. Why do they assume all women want pink or other colors????!!! I thought ordering two sizes down in men's ( I am a women's 8, so I ordered a men's 6) would fit but the men's 6 was too small. So I will try going up a half size to a 6.5.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Gertmenian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good turf shoes-bought these for my son (to play a tournament on a artificial turf field) they were great and fit him perfectly. Wish more young players would get off the addidas/Nike bandwagon and start trying the old school brands like diadora, lotto and unbro.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: As I read the reviews I knew what to expect, they fit a bit smaller than the size. I would usually wear 7 so I ordered 6.5
customer_reviews.author: Dulce Turcios

customer_reviews.title: Would love it if the treads we're a little taller (like ...
customer_reviews.text: Would love it if the treads we're a little taller (like the Adidas Mundial), but all in all, a good shoe. Traction is pretty good on short grass. My feet are a little wide, and these fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The insoles fell apart after two games. Unusable but ...
customer_reviews.text: The insoles fell apart after two games. Unusable but of course unreturnable too. Disappointing from Diadora on all fronts, both product and customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: slightly wider than adidas and nike
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for wider soccer shoes, and diadora gives me more room than other popular brands. Good for flat feet (wide).
customer_reviews.author: S. Shaikh

customer_reviews.title: Half size makes a difference
customer_reviews.text: Half sizes made all the difference. Many manufactures of turf shoes above size 12 don't off half sizes Diadora does. No more damaged toe nails. I use them for soccer refereeing.
customer_reviews.author: paul belben

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe, but could use more support in the sole/insole.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit well and the upper is excellent quality, but I could use more support in the lower part of the shoe for playing ~90 min.
customer_reviews.author: A. Vanderhoeven

customer_reviews.title: I personally loved these very comfortable soft leather reminded me of the ...
customer_reviews.text: I personally loved these very comfortable soft leather reminded me of the kangaroo leather back in the day with Patrick Cleats.. Anyone know about those?? LOL
customer_reviews.author: HECTOR RODRIGUEZ

customer_reviews.title: stitches) are very good and precise
customer_reviews.text: Usually my size is 9.5 (US). Bought a 9.0 (US) that fits. Two games to break them in: now they fit perfectly! They're very soft and touching the ball is a pleasure. The manufacturing details (e.g. stitches) are very good and precise. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Gene B.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: fits larger than expected. need to wear thick socks or two pairs
customer_reviews.author: EXB

customer_reviews.title: Size was too large, the quality is not as ...
customer_reviews.text: Size was too large , the quality is not as i was expected , it feel and looked fake , very disapointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is acceptable to some extent to play in open spaces
customer_reviews.author: Abdulaziz

customer_reviews.title: Quality could be better
customer_reviews.text: Nice soccer shoe,but I was expecting a liitle more qaulity for the price. The laces are very cheap looking and feeling. They are comfortable. I will review again after I use them on the pitch for awhile
customer_reviews.author: Jeff C.

customer_reviews.title: Comfort Zone!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed last night's game with these turf shoes, unfortunately I did not score because I did not get any passes. Hopefully in the next game I will score 10 goals:)
customer_reviews.author: wilson estrada

customer_reviews.title: Trying to fit a double E wide foot with soccer ...
customer_reviews.text: Trying to fit a double E wide foot with soccer shoes is next to impossible. This is not the shoe for this type of foot. Next to impossible to find wide-width soccer shoes for men.
customer_reviews.author: LandLocked

customer_reviews.title: ouch
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in my exact size, as suggested by the vendor. I reffed one game on turf and suffered a blister on the top of my toe.
customer_reviews.author: David Gire

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This is not a "Mens" shoe. It is a boys.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Saari

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Toe seem came apart after two games. Very low quality
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

product_meta.title: Diadora Mens Capitano LT Turf-M Capitano Lt Turf-m
